text: One True Thing, originally known as Scarab, was an American pop rock band from Long Island, New York. The band gained notable attention when lead singer, Melanie Wills, sang on two From Autumn to Ashes' songs, "Short Stories With Tragic Endings" and "Autumn’s Monologue." ==Band members== *Melanie Wills - vocals *Milan Millevoy - guitar *Mike Pilato - bass *Ray Greene - drums ==Discography== ===Albums=== Finally... (2002, reissued 2004) ==References== ==External links== *Official Site (Archived Page) *Official Bio (Archived Page) * * *One True Thing at PureVolume Category:American pop rock music groups Category:Musical groups from Long Island
title: One True Thing (band)
